product_name: Harmony Valley Camp Cuisine Hummus Mix
long_description: The Harmony Valley Camp Cuisine Hummus Mix is a convenient dry mix that allows you to always have hummus at your fingertips. Simply add a bit of water and olive oil and you'll have hummus in minutes.
short_description: The Harmony Valley Camp Cuisine Hummus Mix is a convenient dry mix that allows you to always have hummus at your fingertips. Simply add a bit of water and olive oil and you'll have hummus in minutes.
